content.rendered:
A blog ride through Kerala

A bus for bloggers

Every year, 30 chosen bloggers and social media influencers board a luxury bus that takes them on a two-week road trip across God’s Own Country. Organized by the Department of Tourism, Kerala Blog Express provides a handful of international bloggers a unique platform to experience Kerala in full bloom.
